summary: The implementation successfully covers all core requirements from the BuildRequest. The website includes all required sections (homepage with hero, games showcase, videos/content section, about section, and contact/community section) with proper navigation, gaming-themed design using bold colors (orange/red primary with dark mode), dynamic typography, and backend functionality for managing games and videos. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the file evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration with login/logout functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User authentication system' as a non-goal, but the implementation includes Internet Identity provider, authentication hooks (useInternetIdentity.ts), and auth-related functionality in the actor setup

hallucinated_features.description: Backend storage implementation with blob storage system
hallucinated_features.reason: While backend functionality for games/videos is requested, the implementation includes a comprehensive blob storage system (MixinStorage, Storage) that was not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest
